docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Columnae turaque
docs.text: Est nec quantus: unde fugit; auras unum apta et ferro si montibus genus. Satae tenet alimentaque tibi et iacta; sine dea ipsis est. docs.title: Duos hanc degener
docs.text:
Fuit secutus, usum gratia illa! Me aras abscedit, venatibus aequoribus rector omne, servitura sede, domos aberat, discedere inque, es.

  1. Fieri nate non quoque auris Hippotaden videre
  2. Et malit se arguis auxerat graditur differtis
  3. Et eris

Ecce Ismenides cervus carmina gaudere at captam quis, remotis cadit matertera? Testata postquam petisse murice? Vipereasque esse, idem supplex patuit missa ipsa tamen, ut ferrum crura vocari tandem et. Fama narrare odio: dextera in artus haerens ire feres phoenica, sed magnum, non!

docs.title: 在GitHub上手动deploy Mkdocs
docs.text:
1. 根据mkdocs的官方指引，创建好本地文件（e.g., 储存在一个叫notebook的文件夹里）
  2. 在GitHub上创建一个新的repo，例如 https://github.com/username/reponame
  3. 在notebook的目录下输入以下指令 git init # build the local repo git add . # track all the local files git commit -m "commit message" git remote add origin https://github.com/username/reponame.git # add the remote repo referenced by the url, and rename it "origin" locally git push -u origin main # push the change from local branch "main" to remote branch "origin"
  4. 输入mkdocs gh-deploy，GitHub自动将页面deploy后即可查看网页

在第2步中，如注释所写，最后一条指令是将本地的main分支的内容push到远程的origin分支中。其中远程分支的名字origin在git remote add ...中指定，而本地分支可以用git branch来查看，否则可能会报错。

docs.title: 提醒后续更新
docs.text: 根据mkdocs-material的解释，这种手动deploy的方法需要在进行本地修改后
